title: Nero Burn Express Version 4
description: Burn what is most important. Fast and Easy! Cut to the chase with Nero Burn Express 4, and get all the performance and efficiency of the industry leading burning engine. Burn, copy and rip your data, home videos, photos and music to CD, DVD and Blu-ray Disc with superb disc quality in just a few clicks. Plus you get advanced security options such as password and encryption protection for full control of your burning projects.
